pages.text: $(bgreen)Chomper$() almost got a gig doing stunts for The Little Shop of Horrors but it fell through when his agent demanded too much on the front end.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)150$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close attack$() plant, which will ate nearby enemy and each attack need a $(l)long rest$(). When facing high health target, its damage will $(bred)reduce to 2%$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will summon $(l)serveral ground chompers$() to instant kill enemies.
